text: Does anyone know what actually happened at Google?

attachments.fallback: <https://twitter.com/joemfbrown|@joemfbrown>: I’m sitting here in the dark in my toddler’s room because the light is controlled by <https://twitter.com/Google|@Google> Home. Rethinking... a lot right now.

elements.text: Does anyone know what actually happened at Google?

text: Hmm.. “Today, at 3.47AM PT Google experienced an authentication system outage for approximately 45 minutes due to an internal storage quota issue. Services requiring users to log in experienced high error rates during this period. The authentication system issue was resolved at 4:32AM PT. All services are now restored. We apologise to everyone affected, and we will conduct a thorough follow up review to ensure this problem cannot recur in the future.”

elements.text: Hmm.. “Today, at 3.47AM PT Google experienced an authentication system outage for approximately 45 minutes due to an internal storage quota issue. Services requiring users to log in experienced high error rates during this period. The authentication system issue was resolved at 4:32AM PT. All services are now restored.
